data.title: EARTH SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY
data.meta_description: Japan Agency for Marine-Earth Science and Technology (JAMSTEC) has the main objective to contribute to the advancement of academic research in addition to the improvement of marine science and technology by proceeding the fundamental research and development on marine, and the cooperative activities on the academic research related to the Ocean for the benefit of the peace and human welfare.
data.meta_site_name: JAMSTEC - JAPAN AGENCY FOR MARINE-EARTH SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY
data.text:
Through various research facilities and approaches from various research fields, we aim to realize the maintenance and development of peopleâs lives and the global environment.

JAMSTEC conducts research activities that contribute to society with the support of the public and companies.
